name: R1_Standard Room
description: This cozy room offers a comfortable double bed, perfect for solo travelers or couples. The room features a modern design with warm colors and includes a work desk, a flat-screen TV, and a small seating area. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a shower, complimentary toiletries, and fluffy towels. Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi and daily housekeeping service.

name: R2_Standard Double Room
description: The suite features a separate bedroom with a king-sized bed, a living room with a sofa and armchairs, a dining area, and a private balcony with stunning views. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a bathtub, a separate shower, and premium toiletries..

name: LD03 LOUNGE CHAIR
description: Expertly rendered by Carl Hansen & Søn, the lounge chair—first introduced in 1951 and enduring ever since—is available in oak or as a combination of oak and walnut, sourced from sustainable forestry. Choose from seat and back upholstery in a selection of leather options or in a custom fabric.
